cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1079, Desert Locust Control Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 29 (Monday, February 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of New Jersey:
H.R. 1079.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 of the US Constitution
[Page H515]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Desert Locust Control Act
